plot: A martial arts expert takes control of ten martial arts schools by slaying the masters, but the son of one learns the secret of Drunken Martial Arts and, with his two friends, attempts revenge.
title: Chwipalgwon gwangpalgwon
plot_es: A martial arts expert takes control of ten martial arts schools by slaying the masters, but the son of one learns the secret of Drunken Martial Arts and, with his two friends, attempts revenge.
plot_en: A martial arts expert takes control of ten martial arts schools by slaying the masters, but the son of one learns the secret of Drunken Martial Arts and, with his two friends, attempts revenge.
